name: Cramped Combat
description:
This is a game where you can fight your friends and family, while not having the hassle of connecting online, but having your hands cramp as you and your friends fight over the keyboard! Play as different classic fantasy characters and see how long you last! 

Player 1 Controls  ~   Left - A     Right - D     Attack - S     Jump - Tab

Player 2 Controls  ~   Left - left arrow     Right - right arrow     Attack - down arrow    Jump - Alt
